Tune Yer Head

Aaron Curry

This engineered plastics moulding device exposes the complexity of the analog machine.

The automated artist here produces replicas of the neon sculpture in the gallery.

Coin operated, it brings back the atmosphere of video game arcades from the 80’s and 90’s, but the disciple of the XX Century is not merely looking back. Curry’s message points forward - to the future of our species.

Aaron Curry

Update Required To play audio, be sure to enable JavaScript, and run a browser that supports HTML5 MP3 audio, or update your Flash plugin.
